content: Hello, and apologies if this is a redundant post, but does anyone already have a tool to take history files from the unstructured ne30 grid to a regular lat-lon grid?
As followup, in the LMWG we've been using our older mkprocdata_map, which is effective, but hasn't been ported to Derecho. We're wondering if it needs to be, vs. adopting something more 'modern'?
Hi @Will Wieder -- I made a really simple script that calls ncremap. You might give it a try and see if it works: https://github.com/brianpm/AMP_toolbox/blob/main/regridding_tools/remap_dir
Couple of options for CAM output in this blog post. The example here is ne120, but in principle it should be the same.
